00066         
00067         struct CreateFunc :public       btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc
00068         {
00069                 virtual btCollisionAlgorithm* CreateCollisionAlgorithm(btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci, const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap)
00070                 {
00071                         void* mem = ci.m_dispatcher1->allocateCollisionAlgorithm(sizeof(btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm));
00072                         return new(mem) btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm(ci,body0Wrap,body1Wrap,false);
00073                 }
00074         };
00075 
00076         struct SwappedCreateFunc :public        btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc
00077         {
00078                 virtual btCollisionAlgorithm* CreateCollisionAlgorithm(btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci, const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap)
00079                 {
00080                         void* mem = ci.m_dispatcher1->allocateCollisionAlgorithm(sizeof(btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm));
00081                         return new(mem) btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm(ci,body0Wrap,body1Wrap,true);
00082                 }
00083         };
